meanings: leave to take its own course

meanings.meaning: let somebody stew in their own juice

vlive.korean: 그냥 내버려 두는 사람이냐? Or do you just leave it as it is? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : [Two Kids Room(투키즈룸)] VOL.5 Ep.08 창빈 X 현진
vlive.english: Or do you just leave it as it is?

vlive.korean: 호루라기 내버려 두고 뭐하냐? What are you doing not using the whistle? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.83
vlive.english: What are you doing not using the whistle?

vlive.korean: 뭘 하면... 그냥 내버려 두라고? If I do something... Just leave it as is? 듣기 View video 우주소녀(WJSN) : [수빈] 요즘 뭐하니~? 오늘 한번 만나볼까~😘
vlive.english: If I do something... Just leave it as is?

vlive.korean: 나 좀 내버려 둘래? Can you leave me alone? 듣기 View video MONSTA X : [Replay] MONSTA X-RAY 3 (몬스타엑스레이 3)_5화
아이! 죽게 내버려 둬! Just leave me to die then! 듣기 View video Dingo Story / 딩고스토리 : [썸남]#11화 - 내 몸이 이렇게 뜨거워도 되는 거?
vlive.english: Just leave me to die then!
